channel.title: k3s on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in k3s on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: From Minikube to k3s
item.description: My main dev computer is a Linux, my laptop being OSX, I’ve used minikube for several years, let’s evaluate k3s. On Linux, Minikube is using a virtualisation layer (kvm/qemu, Virtualbox…), since it’s mandatory on OSX because it needs Linux, it can be avoided on a native Linux.
